titles.title: Congratulating the University of Illinois Fighting Illini men's tennis team for their successful season.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on 21st Century Competitiveness.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

bill.summary: 7/9/2003--Introduced. Congratulates the University of Illinois Fighting Illini men's tennis team on winning the 2003 National Championship.
